jobDescription: SQL Data AnalystUp to $75k per year  DC6975561128Pinnacle Partners is assisting our client in their search for a SQL Data Analyst to add to their team located in the Chicago area. The successful resource offers a Bachelor’s degree and at least 2 years of T-SQL experience. Exposure to data visualization tools like SSRS and Tableau would also be helpful. This is an excellent opportunity to join a growing team in a stable organization. Our client offers excellent benefits and great work life balance.ResponsibilitiesProvide denials analysis and support denials solutionUse T-SQL to retrieve dataInterpret complex data requestsVisualize the data in a way that makes sense for each requestHelp stakeholders make use of the dataPerform data analysis and “proof of concept” on business users ideas for applicationsNavigate complex data structures in SQL Server to retrieve dataRequirementsBachelor’s degreeAt least 2 years of experience with T-SQLExperience with Data Visualization tools such as SSRS, Tableau, and PowerBIPreferred experience with Healthcare data, financial, patient accounting dataStrong analytic skillsWork well in collaboration cross functionallyAble to extract data and analyze it to make business decisionsTermsThis is a direct hire opportunity with a salary based on experience up to $75k
